001package imagingbook.calibration.zhang;
002
003import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
004import java.util.Arrays;
005
006import org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateMatrixFunction;
007import org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateVectorFunction;
008import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory;
009import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresOptimizer.Optimum;
010import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer;
011import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.MultivariateJacobianFunction;
012import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.ArrayRealVector;
013import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector;
014
015/**
016 * Abstract super-class for non-linear optimizers used for
017 * final, overall optimization of calibration parameters.
018 * The actual optimization is performed by the sub-classes.
019 * @author WB
020 */
021public abstract class NonlinearOptimizer {
022
023        private static int maxEvaluations = 1000;
024        private static int maxIterations = 1000;
025
026        protected final Point2D[] modelPts;
027        protected final Point2D[][] obsPts;
028        protected final int M;          // number of views
029        protected final int N;          // number of model points
030        protected int camParLength;             // number of camera parameters (7)
031        protected int viewParLength;    // number of view parameters (6)
032
033        private Camera initCam = null;
034        private Camera finalCamera = null;
035        private ViewTransform[] initViews = null;
036        private ViewTransform[] finalViews = null;
037
038        protected NonlinearOptimizer(Point2D[] modelPts, Point2D[][] obsPts) {
039                this.modelPts = modelPts;
040                this.obsPts = obsPts;
041                this.M = obsPts.length;
042                this.N = modelPts.length;
043        }
044
045        /**
046         * Performs Levenberg-Marquardt non-linear optimization to get better
047         * estimates of the parameters.
048         * @param initCam the initial camera parameters
049         * @param initViews the initial view transforms
050         */
051        protected void optimize(Camera initCam, ViewTransform[] initViews) {
052                this.initCam = initCam;
053                this.initViews = initViews;
054                this.camParLength = initCam.getParameterVector().length;
055                this.viewParLength = initViews[0].getParameters().length;
056
057                MultivariateVectorFunction V = makeValueFun();
058                MultivariateMatrixFunction J = makeJacobianFun();
059
060                RealVector start = makeInitialParameters();
061                RealVector observed = makeObservedVector();
062                
063                MultivariateJacobianFunction model = LeastSquaresFactory.model(V, J);
064                LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer lm = new LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer();
065                Optimum result = lm.optimize(LeastSquaresFactory.create(
066                                model,
067                                observed, 
068                                start, 
069                                null, 
070                                maxEvaluations, 
071                                maxIterations));
072                
073//              System.out.println(NonlinearOptimizer.class.getSimpleName() + "; iterations = " + result.getIterations());
074                updateEstimates(result.getPoint());
075        }
076
077        /**
078         * To be implemented by subclasses.
079         * @return a vector value function
080         */
081        abstract MultivariateVectorFunction makeValueFun();
082        
083        /**
084         * To be implemented by subclasses.
085         * @return a Jacobian function
086         */
087        abstract MultivariateMatrixFunction makeJacobianFun();
088        
089        
090        /**
091         * Common value function for optimizers defined in sub-classes.
092         */
093        protected class ValueFun implements MultivariateVectorFunction {
094                
095                @Override
096                public double[] value(double[] params) {
097                        final double[] a = Arrays.copyOfRange(params, 0, camParLength);
098                        final Camera cam = new Camera(a);
099                        final double[] Y = new double[2 * M * N];
100                        int c = 0; 
101                        for (int m = 0; m < M; m++) {
102                                int q = camParLength + m * viewParLength;
103                                double[] w = Arrays.copyOfRange(params, q, q + viewParLength);
104                                ViewTransform view = new ViewTransform(w);
105                                for (int n = 0; n < N; n++) {
106                                        double[] uv = cam.project(view, modelPts[n]);
107                                        Y[c * 2 + 0] = uv[0];
108                                        Y[c * 2 + 1] = uv[1];
109                                        c = c + 1;
110                                }
111                        }
112                        return Y;
113                }
114        }
115
116        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
117
118        private RealVector makeInitialParameters() {
119                double[] s = initCam.getParameterVector();
120                double[] c = new double[s.length + M * viewParLength];
121
122                // insert camera parameters at beginning of c
123                System.arraycopy(s, 0, c, 0, s.length);
124
125                // insert M view parameters
126                int start = s.length;
127                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
128                        double[] w = initViews[i].getParameters();
129                        System.arraycopy(w, 0, c, start, w.length);
130                        start = start + w.length;
131                }
132                return new ArrayRealVector(c);
133        }
134
135
136        /**
137         * Stack the observed image coordinates of the calibration pattern points into
138         * a vector.
139         * @return the observed vector
140         */
141        protected RealVector makeObservedVector()       {
142                double[] obs = new double[M * N * 2];
143                for (int i = 0, k = 0; i < M; i++) {
144                        for (int j = 0; j < N; j++, k++) {
145                                obs[k * 2 + 0] = obsPts[i][j].getX();
146                                obs[k * 2 + 1] = obsPts[i][j].getY();
147                        }
148                }
149                // obs = [u_{0,0}, v_{0,0}, u_{0,1}, v_{0,1}, ..., u_{M-1,N-1}, v_{M-1,N-1}]
150                return new ArrayRealVector(obs); 
151        }
152
153        private void updateEstimates(RealVector parameters) {
154                double[] c = parameters.toArray();
155                double[] s = Arrays.copyOfRange(c, 0, camParLength);
156                finalCamera = new Camera(s);
157
158                finalViews = new ViewTransform[M];
159                int start = s.length;
160                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
161                        double[] w = Arrays.copyOfRange(c, start, start + viewParLength);
162                        finalViews[i] = new ViewTransform(w);
163                        start = start + w.length;
164                }
165        }
166        
167        /**
168         * Returns the optimized camera parameters.
169         * @return the optimized camera parameters
170         */
171        protected Camera getFinalCamera() {
172                return finalCamera;
173        }
174
175        /**
176         * Returns the optimized view parameters.
177         * @return the optimized view parameters
178         */
179        protected ViewTransform[] getFinalViews() {
180                return finalViews;
181        }
182        
183}
